src:
Doa Son Heung-Min Untuk Andre Gomes
04 Nov 2019, 21:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penyerang Tottenham Son Heung-Min mendoakan Andre Gomes agar ia lekas pulih dari cedera engkel kaki yang dialaminya.
Laga Everton vs Tottenham pada matchday 11 Premier Leagie di Goodison Park, Minggu (03/11/2019) akan membekas di benak Son Heung-Min selamanya. Sebab di laga itu, tekelnya membuat Andre Gomes mengalami cedera parah di engkel kaki kanannya.
Pada menit 78, pemain asal Koreal Selatan itu berusaha untuk merebut bola dari penguasaan Gomes. Namun gagal dan Son membuat Gomes kehilangan keseimbangan.
Eks pemain Barcelona itu kemudian terjatuh dan menabrak Serge Aurier. Setelah itu terlihat engkel kaki kanannya seperti patah.
text:
Son Heung-Min's Prayer for Andre Gomes
Nov 04 2019, 21:14 by Bola.net
Soccer - Tottenham striker Son Heung-Min prayed for Andre Gomes to recover quickly from the ankle injury he suffered.
Everton vs Tottenham's match on Matchday 11 Premier Leagie at Goodison Park on Sunday (03/11/2019) will remain in the mind of Son Heung-Min forever. Because in that match, his tackle made Andre Gomes badly injured in the ankle of his right foot.
At minute 78, the South Korean player tried to snatch the ball from Gomes's possession. But it failed and Son made Gomes lose balance.
The former Barcelona player then fell and crashed into Serge Aurier. After that it looks like the ankle of his right leg is like broken.
